Taylor Swift Louisville tickets on sale Dec. 12

Taylor Swift tickets on sale Dec. 12 for show at Louisville's KFC Yum! Center

Taylor Swift Louisville tickets on sale Dec. 12

Jeffrey Lee Puckett, jpuckett@courier-journal.com 1:26 p.m. EST December 4, 2014

Tickets for Taylor Swift’s June 2 concert at the KFC Yum! Center go on sale Dec. 12.(Photo: Provided)

CONNECT 1 TWEETLINKEDINCOMMENTEMAILMORE

Tickets for Taylor Swift's June 2 concert at the KFC Yum! Center will go on sale to the general public Dec. 12 at noon.

Tickets will be available at the KFC Yum! Center box office, online at www.ticketmaster.com and by phone, (800) 745-3000. Only two price points are listed by Ticketmaster, $36.50 and $134.50.

American Express members and members of TaylorSwift.com can purchase tickets in advance at 10 a.m. Dec. 5 through 10 p.m. Dec. 11.
